name: Legend Horn
desc: In the cities which used horn, all allies increase ATK by 50% and DEF by 50%.

name: Epic Horn
desc: In the cities which used horn, all allies increase ATK by 30% and DEF by 30%.

name: Advanced Horn
desc: In the cities which used horn, all allies increase ATK by 10% and DEF by 20%.

name: Elementary Horn
desc: In the cities which used horn, all allies increase ATK by 5% and DEF by 10%.
